text:
<@U013GG8K612>
Yeah, this was so easy thank you! I haven't though about the min-height, so I guess there is no way to set the min-height to wrap all its children's height ?

Hey gang!! we have a user on the HubSpot Community who is looking for assistance with their blog template; if anyone has any suggestions / tips for this user, it would be greatly appreciated! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/How-to-Create-Custom-Blog-Post-Summaries-for-Blog-Listing-Pages/m-p/261820/highlight/true#M359>
Replied him, lets see if it solve the issue.
